comments.body:
We should also cover this case in the fuller expression evaluator, e.g. "this-is-a-dns.domain.com/key-with-dash in (so,what)".

We should also have coverage for keys that look like numbers (which are actually valid).  A key called "0" is legit, I think.

I would like to see a test that combines the exact-match syntax and the set-based syntax, such as:

```
x=a,y!=b,z in (h,i,j)
```
